attributes.action: Introduce more stretching/competitive educational achievement from early years to secondary.
attributes.additional_details: To attain the best educational results children must be stretched from the start of nursary onwards to secondary. At nursary this does not need to be impossibly hard but formative development occurs at this age and its best for the education system to be hard at this age as it means it will be easier for them at a later age as they will have better cognitive processing skills.
